alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lee, northwestern Sumter, east central Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of McEntire Air Base, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, McEntire Air Base, Shaw Air Base, Eastover, Oakland, Sumter County Airport, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Spring Hill, Boykin, Fort Jackson McCrady Training Center, Cherryvale, Wateree River Correctional Institution, Rembert, Stateburg, Woodrow and Wedgewood. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 80 and 90, and between mile markers 102 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
